ygData.subject: Formula for HP?
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a known formula for mana:  (INT/5 +2)*lvl There is probably a formula for HP as well.  I will try and figure this out. I need TONS of data from
ygData.messageBody:
There is a known formula for mana: (INT/5 +2)*lvl

There is probably a formula for HP as well. I will try and figure this out.
I need TONS of data from everyone to help me.

Please send to me at mrwayne@... do not reply to the list.

Make sure you don't have any buffs active and remove any magical armor.

Send me the following information:

----------
RACE
CLASS (yes, even the non-warriors too)
LEVEL
STAMINA
----------

Again, please send to me at mrwayne@... do not reply to the
list. I figure if I can get 50-100 data points, I can make a good guess at
a formula.


Wayne
